name: Stream Surfer
description:
Surfs up dudes and dudettes!

Welcome to Stream Surfers, the latest hot game straight from the 80s!

The goal is simple, surf that stream as far as you can by dodging those radical rocks and epic whirlpools, but if you're in a pinch, just jump over those tubular hazards! Running low on time? Collect those handy clocks to boost your time limit! Catch you on the board champ!

Here be the controls:

Movement = WASD or Arrow Keys

Start = x/l

Jump = z/k

Reset High Score = Hold LShift + Q on title or lose screen

This game was made for the 8 Bits to Infinity - Time Jam
